bibl.title: Report on the Third Season of the Egyptian-Swiss Joint Mission at Nag el-Hagar. Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: Third season, February 14th - March 4th, 2007. - Palace [military fortification, late third and fourth century]. - Churches. - Western curtain wall and gate.
bibl.seg: El-Bialy Mohamed and Alexander von Kienlin, Report on the Third Season of the Egyptian-Swiss Joint Mission at Nag el-Hagar. Avec résumé en anglais.
Third season, February 14th - March 4th, 2007. - Palace [military fortification, late third and fourth century]. - Churches. - Western curtain wall and gate.
